type.title: Type of content to scrape
type.description: Choose what you want to scrape: user, hashtag, trend, music, or video.

query.title: Query
query.description: Username, hashtag, music ID, or video URL depending on type.

number.title: Number of posts
number.description: Number of posts to scrape. Set 0 to scrape all available posts.

download.title: Download videos
download.description: Whether to download videos or just extract metadata.

filepath.title: Output folder
filepath.description: Folder where metadata and videos will be saved.
